name: css-image-rendering
description: Css module of single purpose classes for image rendering

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-image-rendering.css > css/css-image-rendering.css && tachyons src/css-image-rendering.css --minify > css/css-image-rendering.min.css && tachyons src/css-image-rendering.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
